UNAUTHORIZED_RESPONSE: You are not authorized to access this api
SOMETHING_WRONG: Something went wrong , please try again
REGISTRATION_WITH_MAIL_SUCCESS: Account created successfully. A verification link is sent your email, Please verify your email
USER_PUSH_NOTIFICATION: Push notification send to all users
USER_ACCOUNT_EXIST: Account already exist with mobile or email
USER_EMAIL_VERIFY_MSG: Registration has been successful. Please follow the link to verify your email
ACCOUNT_NOT_VERIFIED: Your account is not verified. A verification link is sent your email, Please verify your email
EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Could not verify user. Email was expired. Please try login again
OTP_WRONG: You have entered an incorrect OTP
DELIVERY_CANT_DELETE: Cannot delete this delivery boy because he has orders assigned
CURRENT_PASSWORD_INCORRECT: You have entered an incorrect current password
PASSWORD_CHANGED: You have successfully changed your password
USER_EMAIL_NOT_EXIST: User with this email doesnt exist
OTP_SENT_EMAIL: We have sent an OTP to your email. Please verify the OTP to reset your password
BANNER_LINK_MISS: Banner can be linked either to category or product, not both
CATEGORY_NOT_LINK: Category is not linked to products
FAVOURITE_ALREADY_ADDED: Product is already added to your favourites
ORDER_PAYMENT_ERR: Something went wrong with payment retry
ORDER_SUBTOTAL: Order Subtotal must be greater than
CART_ITEM_NOT_FOUND: You have not added items to cart
CART_ITEM_NOT_ADDED: Could not add product to cart
CART_LINKED_ORDER: This cart is linked to an order, you cannot delete this cart
COUPON_EXPIRED: Coupon has been expired, Enter a valid coupon
COUPON_NOT_EXIST: Code does not exist. Enter a valid coupon
LANGUAGE_SET_DEFAULT: Your selected language set as default
ORDER_PENDING_MSG: Thank you for placing new order. we will keep you updated.
ORDER_CONFIRMED_MSG: Your order has been confirmed. It will be delivered soon.
ORDER_OUT_FOR_DELIVERY_MSG: Our delivery person is on its way to deliver your order. we will contact you soon.
ORDER_CANCELLED_MSG: We will not be able to deliver your order. Our sincere apologies.
